song_lyrics: Chhānḍī ke Shrī Ghanshyām, aur ko jo japu nām;
Kar le kaṭārī merī, jīh‍vā kāṭi ḍāriyo... Chhānḍī° ṭek
Lokan kī lāj ḍaru, jo na bhakti chitta dharu;
Pāvakke madhya mere, tan ku prajāriyo... Chhānḍī° 1
Jīvikā ko lobh jānī, bhakti jo karu mai chhānī;
Tehī chhin tan mero,shailse pachhāriyo... Chhānḍī° 2
Muktānand kahe ṭerī, draḍhatā jo ḍage merī;
Shūlī pe chaḍāī tīkhe, tīran se māriyo... Chhānḍī° 3
title: Chhānḍī ke Shrī Ghanshyām aur ko jo japu nām

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-645: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
